bug.author: geevargs
bug.summary: Px4 unreal freezes everytime when exiting the simulation
bug.description: It doesn't seem to leave any trace in the terminal as where it fails. I am not using the sitl but just remote control,it crashes every time I try to stop the simulation and freezes the entire screen.. OS : Linux 14.04 Unreal version 4.17.2 Latest Airsim version <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/AirSim/files/1602328/PX4.log>PX4.log</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This is hard to debug issue and I haven't tried out this specific confi (sitl + RC) on Linux. If possible you might want to switch to Ubuntu 16.04. You might also want to try eliminate as many variables as you can and create a simplest test case to reproduce the issue. For example, does the same thing happen if you use default simple_flight? Does it happen if there is no RC? Does it happen with HITL? Also, look in to Saved folder which might have additional logs. The final way to debug these type of issues is <denchmark-link:http://dirac.org/linux/gdb/06-Debugging_A_Running_Process.php>attach gdb</denchmark-link> and break to see call stack to figure out where freeze is happening.
I have the exact same problem on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and UE version 4.16, 4.17 and 4.18 (Airsim 1.1.7).

This issue is similar to : Px4 stil crash <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim/issues/634>#634</denchmark-link>
I am also facing the same problem. This is the log file: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/AirSim/files/1668741/Blocks-backup-2018.01.27-00.04.00.log>Blocks-backup-2018.01.27-00.04.00.log</denchmark-link>
We won't be able to work on PX4 related issues for some time. I would suggest to use above debugging tips and see if you find anything. It would be great to have contribution to fix this issue!

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sytelus>@sytelus</denchmark-link> I donâ€™t use the Sitl and RC combo.I use RC using AirSim and send Telemetry data through a separate FDM source to different actors in unreal engine.But even when I stop using FDM it still fails on ending the simulation. I eliminated everything and just used an empty scenario and put a BP_Flying pawn in there and still cause an error on exit. This error has happened on multiple systems one 14.04 and the other 16.04. This error does not occur during Simple_Flight and any other mode.If there is no RC then it deosnt crash. This error happens in HITL mode with Quadcopter X firmware. I checked the log files and it abruptly stops logging on exit and crashes completely.
